column4: There should be a configure option for k3b where you can fix the permissions. It will ask you for your password to do it
It usually does it on first run
I could see the device in settings in k3b, but where do I set the permission?
I'm not in front of my computer atm and I can't remember k3b well enough to help you, but you should be able to add yourself to the cdrom group manually like this: usermod -a -G cdrom yourname
